name: @stadionhq/dynamic-yield-js
author: StadionHQ
description: Dynamic Yield API client for JavaScript

scripts.test: echo 'The tests are not implemented yet'
scripts.test:watch: echo 'The tests are not implemented yet'
scripts.preinstall: cd ./src/.api/apis/dy-dev-serve && yarn install && cd ../dy-dev && yarn install
scripts.generate-api:dy-dev-serve: npx api install @dy-dev/v2.3.0#gqe12mawego61 --identifier dy-dev-serve --lang ts --yes && yarn remove @api/dy-dev-serve
scripts.generate-api:dy-dev: npx api install @dy-dev/v2.3.0#gqeomawegkw6 --identifier dy-dev --lang ts --yes && yarn remove @api/dy-dev
scripts.generate-api: rm -rf .api src/.api && npm run generate-api:dy-dev-serve && npm run generate-api:dy-dev && mv .api src/.api
